byline.original: By RICK LYMAN and JOANNA BERENDT

abstract: Demonstrations have broken out in Poland to protest limits on public gatherings proposed by right-wing government; critics say restrictions are emblematic of country's spreading authoritarianism.
lead_paragraph: The measure is the latest move in a new round of what the right-wing governing party calls necessary reforms to strengthen the executive branch.
snippet: The measure is the latest move in a new round of what the right-wing governing party calls necessary reforms to strengthen the executive branch....

headline.main: Protests Erupt in Poland Over New Law on Public Gatherings
headline.print_headline: Poles Protest New Law on Public Gatherings
